WorkItem.Summary: [ProtPaladin] Chance to be Crit and DPS/TPS Issues

Comments.Message: Chance to be crit was off due to the Target Level modifier being applied twice (giving a base 5% + 0.60% + 0.60% chance). Fixed and committed
Do you know which part of the DPS is off? By that I mean, is there a specific stat showing on the pane that doesn't look right to you?
DPS/TPS issue should be resolved in [workitem:14031].  It has been too low since 36040 due to a buggy critical strike calculation.

When I load the same file in 2.2.13 and 2.2.14 and compare the numbers, only DPS and TPS are completely off.
I got DPS=1402.7 in 2.2.13 and DPS=569.6 in 2.2.14
